data.text: Thank you, @FLOTUS, for taking the time to meet with Keith and Aviva Siegel and for giving them a platform to share their experiences while held hostage by Hamas. Keith and Aviva are strong and brave individuals, and I thank them for shining a light on the horrors of Hamas’ evil. https://t.co/4r4WGy7OLt
Lawfare doesn’t strengthen oversight. If we continue this playbook, then Senate oversight hearings will look a lot like this Chappelle skit. https://t.co/kUyXYg7p4j

It is sad that Orbán clearly prefers to be a puppet to Putin instead of a friend to NATO. That’s something the people of Hungary should consider as they head to the polls this spring. https://t.co/A3aO95N8xa
Susan and I are wishing the best of luck to all the Team USA Olympians from North Carolina! We look forward to cheering you on as you go for the gold. 🏅🇺🇸 https://t.co/VIK83uhFHs
